Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Stakeholders took to social media to air their concerns and opinions on the upcoming Australian budget. Many users urged the government officials including Albanese and Chalmers to take urgent action and raise the payment rates to address poverty in the country. They also emphasized the importance of investments in gender equality and building upon previous budget allocations. People acknowledged the constraints of a tight fiscal environment but suggested that relief measures were imperative in ensuring that nobody is left behind. The posts motivated the government officials to act on the recommendations provided by the Economic Inclusion Committee.
